title: InputDataFile
description: Base data model for all dsgrid data models

datamodel__input__static__General.title: BidDSJsonModel
datamodel__input__static__General.description: Base data model for all dsgrid data models

timestamp_start.title: timestamp_start
timestamp_start.description: Period beginning timestamp for the first interval as string: YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss at UTC

timestamp_stop.title: timestamp_stop
timestamp_stop.description: Period beginning timestamp for the interval following the last interval as string: YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss at UTC

season.title: season
season.description: Season of the year the problem lies within

electricity_demand.title: electricity_demand
electricity_demand.description: How demand compares to other times of the year/season

vre_availability.title: vre_availability
vre_availability.description: How variable renewable energy availability compares to other times of the year/season

solar_availability.title: solar_availability
solar_availability.description: How solar availability compares to other times of the year/season

wind_availability.title: wind_availability
wind_availability.description: How wind availability compares to other times of the year/season

weather_temperature.title: weather_temperature
weather_temperature.description: How outside temperature compares to other times of the year/season

day_type.title: day_type
day_type.description: What kind of weekday is represented

net_load.title: net_load
net_load.description: How the net-load profile compares to other times of the year/season

ViolationCostsParameters.title: BidDSJsonModel
ViolationCostsParameters.description: Base data model for all dsgrid data models

p_bus_vio_cost.title: p_bus_vio_cost
p_bus_vio_cost.description: Bus violation costs for active power violation in \$/pu-h

q_bus_vio_cost.title: q_bus_vio_cost
q_bus_vio_cost.description: Bus violation costs for reactive power violation in \$/pu-h

s_vio_cost.title: s_vio_cost
s_vio_cost.description: Branch violation costs for thermal violation in \$/pu-h

e_vio_cost.title: e_vio_cost
e_vio_cost.description: Energy violation costs for energy constraint violation in \$/pu-h

BusInitialStatus.title: BidDSJsonModel
BusInitialStatus.description: Base data model for all dsgrid data models

Bus.title: BidDSJsonModel
Bus.description: Base data model for all dsgrid data models

vm_ub.title: vm_ub
vm_ub.description: Voltage magnitude upper bound in p.u.

vm_lb.title: vm_lb
vm_lb.description: Voltage magnitude lower bound in p.u.

active_reserve_uids.title: active_reserve_uids
active_reserve_uids.description: List of active reserve zones (uids) that the bus participating

reactive_reserve_uids.title: reactive_reserve_uids
reactive_reserve_uids.description: List of reactive reserve zones (uids) that the bus participating

longitude.title: longitude
longitude.description: Bus location - longitude in decimal degree

latitude.title: latitude
latitude.description: Bus location - latitude in decimal degree

initial_status.title: initial_status
initial_status.description: A JSON inner object storing data   for initial time step

ShuntInitialStatus.title: BidDSJsonModel
ShuntInitialStatus.description: Base data model for all dsgrid data models

Shunt.title: BidDSJsonModel
Shunt.description: Base data model for all dsgrid data models

gs.title: gs
gs.description: Shunt conductance for one step in p.u.

bs.title: bs
bs.description: Shunt susceptance for one step in p.u.

initial_status.title: initial_status
initial_status.description: A JSON inner object storing data   for initial time step

DispatchableDevices_SimpleProducingConsu.title: BidDSJsonModel
DispatchableDevices_SimpleProducingConsu.description: Base data model for all dsgrid data models

on_status.title: on_status
on_status.description: On status indicator for initial time step

p.title: p
p.description: { (Case: producer) Active production for initial time step in p.u. (Float) } { (Case: consumer) Active consumption for initial time step in p.u.

q.title: q
q.description: { (Case: producer) Reactive production for initial time step in p.u. (Float) } { (Case: consumer) Reactive consumption for initial time step in p.u.

datamodel__input__static__DispatchableDe.title: BidDSJsonModel
datamodel__input__static__DispatchableDe.description: Base data model for all dsgrid data models

startup_states.title: startup_states
startup_states.description: Array of downtime dependent start up states, where each states  is an array with exactly two elements: 1) start up cost adjustments in \$ (Float), 2) maximum down time in hr (Float)

startups_ub.title: startups_ub
startups_ub.description: Array of time interval startup data blocks, where each  data block is an array with exactly three elements:  1) interval starting time in hr (Float), 2) interval ending time in hr (Float), and  3) maximum startups within the interval (Int)

energy_req_ub.title: energy_req_ub
energy_req_ub.description: Array of energy upper bound requirement data blocks, where each  data block is an array with exactly three elements:  1) interval starting time in hr (Float), 2) interval ending time in hr (Float), and  3) maximum energy within the interval in p.u. (Float)

energy_req_lb.title: energy_req_lb
energy_req_lb.description: Array of energy lower bound requirement data blocks, where each  data block is an array with exactly three elements:  1) interval starting time in hr (Float), 2) interval ending time in hr (Float), and  3) minimum energy within the interval in p.u. (Float)

in_service_time_lb.title: in_service_time_lb
in_service_time_lb.description: Minimum uptime in service in hr

p_ramp_up_ub.title: p_ramp_up_ub
p_ramp_up_ub.description: {(Case: producer) Max production ramp up when operating in p.u./hr (Float)}  {(Case: consumer) Max consumption ramp up when operating in p.u./hr

p_ramp_down_ub.title: p_ramp_down_ub
p_ramp_down_ub.description: {(Case: producer) Max production ramp down when operating in p.u./hr (Float)}  {(Case: consumer) Max consumption ramp down when operating in p.u./hr

p_startup_ramp_ub.title: p_startup_ramp_ub
p_startup_ramp_ub.description: {(Case: producer) Max production ramp up when start up in p.u./hr (Float)}  {(Case: consumer) Max consumption ramp up when start up in p.u./hr

p_shutdown_ramp_ub.title: p_shutdown_ramp_ub
p_shutdown_ramp_ub.description: {(Case: producer) Max production ramp down when shut down in p.u./hr (Float)}  {(Case: consumer) Max consumption ramp down when shut down in p.u./hr

initial_status.title: initial_status
initial_status.description: A JSON inner object storing data for initial time step

p_reg_res_up_ub.title: p_reg_res_up_ub
p_reg_res_up_ub.description: Maximum regulation reserve up in p.u.

p_reg_res_down_ub.title: p_reg_res_down_ub
p_reg_res_down_ub.description: Maximum regulation reserve down in p.u.

p_ramp_res_up_online_ub.title: p_ramp_res_up_online_ub
p_ramp_res_up_online_ub.description: Maximum ramp up reserve when online in p.u.

p_ramp_res_down_online_ub.title: p_ramp_res_down_online_ub
p_ramp_res_down_online_ub.description: Maximum ramp down reserve when online in p.u.

p_ramp_res_up_offline_ub.title: p_ramp_res_up_offline_ub
p_ramp_res_up_offline_ub.description: Maximum ramp up reserve when offline in p.u.

p_ramp_res_down_offline_ub.title: p_ramp_res_down_offline_ub
p_ramp_res_down_offline_ub.description: Maximum ramp down reserve when offline in p.u.

q_0.title: q_0
q_0.description: { (Case: producer) Reactive production at zero active production in p.u. (Float) } { (Case: consumer) Reactive consumption at zero active consumption in p.u.

q_0_ub.title: q_0_ub
q_0_ub.description: { (Case: producer) Max reactive production at zero active production in p.u. (Float)}  { (Case: consumer) Max reactive consumption at zero active consumption in p.u.

q_0_lb.title: q_0_lb
q_0_lb.description: { (Case: producer) Min reactive production at zero active production in p.u. (Float)}  { (Case: consumer) Min reactive consumption at zero active consumption in p.u.

beta_ub.title: beta_ub
beta_ub.description: Upper bound for slope of active-reactive capability curve

beta_lb.title: beta_lb
beta_lb.description: Lower bound for slope of active-reactive capability curve

datamodel__input__timeseries__Dispatchab.description: Base data model for all dsgrid data models

p_ub.title: p_ub

p_lb.title: p_lb
p_lb.description: { (Case: producer) Lower bound of active dispatch in p.u. (Array of Float)    } { (Case: consumer) Lower bound of active demand in p.u.

cost.title: cost
cost.description: A time series array of cost functions, where each function is represented as an array of cost block.  A cost block is an array (pair) with exactly two elements: 1) marginal cost in \$/p.u.-hr (Float), and 2) block size in p.u. (Float)
